item.title: Panasonic Link2Cell Bluetooth DECT 6.0 Expandable Cordless Phone System with Answering Machine and Enhanced Noise Reduction – 5 Handsets – KX-TGE675B (Black)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Product Dimensions 7.8 x 3.9 x 6.7 inches Item Weight 3.15 pounds ASIN B08NWCW5XH Item model number KX-TGE675B Batteries 10 AAA batteries required. (included) Customer Reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 208 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars Best Sellers Rank #832 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products) #7 in Landline Phones ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Product Dimensions 7.8 x 3.9 x 6.7 inches
Item Weight 3.15 pounds
ASIN B08NWCW5XH
Item model number KX-TGE675B
Batteries 10 AAA batteries required. (included)
Customer Reviews

4.4 out of 5 stars

208 ratings

4.4 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #832 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products)
#7 in Landline Phones
Date First Available September 26, 2020
Manufacturer Panasonic

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $169.99 - $149.78
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:36 UTC – Details)


This 5 Handset Cordless Phone has a digital answering maching and dual keypad. Hear who’s calling from across the room with talking Caller ID announcements in English and Spanish from the based unit and cordless handsets. Easily block up to 1000 telemarketers with one-touch dedicated call block buttons on base and handsets. Link to Siri, Google or S Voice with the Remote Voice Assist.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 1000 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 10 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal DECT 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

KX-TGE675B

5 Handsets Cordless Phone System with Link2Cell

Make working from home easier and stress-free with the smart, easy-to-use KX-TGE675B cordless phone system. Connect to a cell phone via Bluetooth for landline-level clarity on mobile calls. Robust,1-step Call Block helps you avoid nuisance callers, and many other features provide daily convenience.

Link2Cell Technology

Make and receive cellphone calls

Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit to get increased call clarity and reliability, avoiding cell dead zones in your home. The handsets alert you when your cell phone receives incoming calls and texts and allow you to make and receive mobile phone calls with landline clarity.

Automated Call Block + One-Touch Call Block

Talk to people, not computers. Automated Call Block stops robocallers from getting through by prompting callers to press “1” to connect their call. Plus, you can easily block other unwanted callers (up to 1000 numbers) with the touch the Call Block button

Designed for Ease-of-Use

This phone is packed with easy-to-use design features. A large 1.88-in display + large button backlit keypad makes it easy to dial and see call info. Turned off the ringer? A bright LED flashes when there’s an incoming call. Volume too low? Use the side volume button to quickly adjust, even mid-call

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Missed a call? Get message notifications even if you're away from home, or retrieve messages easily from the handset; up to 18 minutes of record time.

Noise-Free Talking & Listening

Noise reduction technology lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Phonebook stores up to 100 important numbers. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call.

Long Battery Life with Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.

Panasonic Cordless Phones Features Comparison

KX-TGE675B

KX-TGE66x Series Phones

KX-TGE64x Series Phones

KX-TGE63x Series Phones
